nodes.text: This vehicle was used by Gorga Desilijic Aarrpo on Nothoiin during his ambush of the Goldskin Parade. It featured a rectenna and was used as a mobile command vehicle during the operation. Gorga used this vehicle to remotely control a Separatist Heavy Speeder which had been recently captured by the Galactic Republic after the liberation of Nothoiin. During the ambush, Gorga's vehicle was rammed by the Separatist Heavy Speeder and the Hutt crime lord was arrested.
